trans-unit.source: Will reset all plugins to defaults.
* Published date was changed to be after source published date.
Follow other users to see their subscriptions alongside yours here.
Stacked or side by side layout toggle
Locking is permanent once saved. Are you sure you want to lock?
This theme will be used on every page. Tag page themes will be ignored.

User tags must start with the "+user/" or "_user/" prefix. Tags must be lower case letters and forward slashes. Must not start with a slash or contain two forward slashes in a row. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "+user/alice", "_user/bob", or "+user/department/charlie")
Must be a valid URI (see RFC 3986).

Tags must be lower case letters, numbers, periods and forward slashes. Must not start with a forward slash or period. Must not or contain two forward slashes or periods in a row. Protected tags start with a plus sign. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "science", "my/tag", or "_my/private/tag")

Origins must start with an at sign (@) and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and periods. The default origin is blank. Must not start with a period or contain two periods in a row. (i.e. "@origin", "@my.origin", or "").

Plugin tags must start with the "plugin/", "+plugin/" or "_plugin/" prefix. Tags must be lower case letters, numbers, periods and forward slashes. Must not start with a forward slash or period. Must not or contain two forward slashes or periods in a row. Protected tags start with a plus sign. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "plugin/thumbnail", "plugin/image" "+plugin/cron", or "_plugin/admin")

Templates must be lower case letters, numbers, periods and forward slashes. The root template is blank. Must not start with a forward slash or period. Must not or contain two forward slashes or periods in a row. Protected tags start with a plus sign. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "", "science", "my/tag", or "_my/private/tag")

Tags must be lower case letters, numbers, periods and forward slashes. Must not start with a forward slash or period. Must not or contain two forward slashes or periods in a row. Tags may be qualified with an origin. Origins must start with an at sign (@) and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and periods. Protected tags start with a plus sign. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "science", "science@origin" "my/tag", or "_my/private/tag")

User tags must start with the "+user/" or "_user/" prefix. Tags must be lower case letters and forward slashes. Must not start with a slash or contain two forward slashes in a row. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "+user/alice", "_user/bob", or "+user/department/charlie")

User tags must start with the "+user/" or "_user/" prefix. Tags must be lower case letters and forward slashes. Must not start with a slash or contain two forward slashes in a row. Private tags start with an underscore. Tags may be qualified with an origin. Origins must start with an at sign (@) and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and periods. (i.e. "+user/alice", "_user/bob", or "+user/department/charlie")

Tags must be lower case letters, numbers, periods and forward slashes. Must not start with a forward slash or period. Must not or contain two forward slashes or periods in a row. Use the local wildcard (*) to match all tags with a local origin. Tags may be qualified with an origin, or a wildcard origin (@*). Origins must start with an at sign (@) and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and periods. Use an origin without a tag to match all tags at that origin. The wildcard origin (@*) by itself will match everything. Protected tags start with a plus sign. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "*", "science", "science@origin" "my/tag@", or "_my/private/tag")

Queries support AND (:), OR (|), NOT (!) and grouping qualified tags (parentheses). Tags must be lower case letters, numbers, periods and forward slashes. Must not start with a forward slash or period. Must not or contain two forward slashes or periods in a row. Use the local wildcard (*) to match all tags with a local origin. Tags may be qualified with an origin, or a wildcard origin (@*). Origins must start with an at sign (@) and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and periods. Use an origin without a tag to match all tags at that origin. The wildcard origin (@*) by itself will match everything. Protected tags start with a plus sign. Private tags start with an underscore. (i.e. "science:news", "science@origin science@other" "your/tag my/tag", "!cool", or "news:_my/private/tag")
Send this Ref to the ai for response.
If checked, the AI may return multiple responses including Exts.
Add a signature tag without actually adding it.
Send this Ref to DALL-E for response.
DALL-E signature tag. Plugin configures DALL-E to respond to 'plugin/delta/dalle' prompts and sign this response with this tag
AI signature tag. Plugin configures Navi to respond to 'plugin/delta/ai/navi' prompts and sign this response with this tag. Plugin data contains token usage stats.
Placeholder for dynamic prompt context of all Exts mentioned.
Send this Ref to the ai to create a summary response.
AI signature tag. Plugin configures AI to respond to 'plugin/delta/ai/summary' prompts and sign this response with this tag.
Summarize the following without loosing any important details and do not include any salutations:
Send this Ref to the AI to translate.
AI signature tag. Plugin configures AI to respond to 'plugin/delta/ai/translate' prompts and sign this response with this tag.
Translate the following into the language I'm currently using:
Play audio in an audio player.
Activates built-in Blog mode for viewing Refs.

Cache remote resources locally. If you delete a Ref it's cached file will not be removed from storage right away. If you restore a Ref before the cache is cleared you also recover the cached file. Clicking "empty recycle bin" will immediately free up storage space.

Warning! This is very slow and expensive if you have a large cache.
Files which have only had their Ref deleted can still be recovered, but after this they will be permanently deleted.
Are you sure you want to purge deleted files from storage?
Do not store file, but allow fetching as a proxy.
Cancel saving this Ref resource to the cache.
Save the Ref resource in the cache
Are you sure you want to cache?
Activates built-in Chat mode for viewing Refs.
Activates built-in chatroom in a Ref.
Activates built-in comment support and allows users to create comments.
Debugging template will every feature turned on.
Debugging plugin will every feature turned on.
Activates built-in delete notice support which clears refs and marks them as deleted instead of actually deleting them.
Activates built-in HTML editor support and allows users to format Ref comments as HTML.
Adds LaTeX support to the markdown editor. Use $ to mark inline math, $$ to mark block math.
Embed the webpage in an inline frame.
View which Refs have failed running a script and will not be retried. See the attached logs for the specifics of the error. Click 'retry' to clear the error and try again.
Show experimental plugins on setup page
Import entries from an RSS / Atom feed. The feed will be scraped on an interval you specify.
Schedule this feed to pull every 15 minutes.
Scrape the feed and add any new Refs.
Are you sure you want to pull?
Strip all query parameters from the feed entry URLs.
Don't use the ETag to check if a feed is updated.
Allow storing user files on the server.
Activates built-in Folder mode for viewing Refs.
Fullscreen the viewer when shown. If optional is set the viewer may be shown if fullscreen is not available or the user has cancelled fullscreen.
Activates built-in graph support and allows users to create graphs.
Mark Refs as hidden for the current user
Customise this Ext to customise the home screen.
Add button to editor to convert HTML into Markdown.
Activates built-in Image viewer mode for viewing Refs.
Activates built-in Kanban mode for viewing Refs.
Embed a Lens in a Ref
Activates built-in Lens viewer mode for viewing Refs.
Adds dms tab to inbox. Adds buttons to create private direct messages with users.
'The inbox plugin allow sending notifications to another user on the same server.'
The outbox plugin allow sending notifications to another user on a remote server.
Are you sure you want to install this mod?
This tag marks posts as approved by a moderator. Adds a modlist tab to the inbox.
This tag marks posts as NSFW.
This plugin reports Refs for moderation.
Report a problem with this post.
Are you sure you want to report this post?
This plugin silences reports on a Ref.
Create a Japanese Triangle and show the longest Ninja Path.
Keep private notes in a notebook.
Warning! This will load in the default set of oEmbed settings, overwriting any changes you have made. Any additional oEmbed settings you have added will not be deleted.

Replicate a remote Jasper instance. The remote origin will be scraped on an interval you specify. If the remote is also set up to replicate from this instance, you may communicate with remote users. You may configure if metadata is generated or plugins are validated.

Replicate a remote Jasper instance. The remote origin will be scraped on an interval you specify. If the remote is also set up to replicate from this instance, you may communicate with remote users. You may configure if metadata is generated or plugins are validated.
Pull a batch of updates from the remote.
Push modifications to a remote origin. On the scheduled interval set, the server will check if the remote cursor is behind the local cursor. If "Push on change" is set changes are pushed immediately.
Push a batch of updates to the remote.
Are you sure you want to push?
Adds an action button to open the PDF version.
Adds filtering and stylizing to support people semantics.
Create a playlist from the list of sources
Create a multiple choice poll and view the results.
Scan or upload a QR Code
Activates built-in Work Queue mode for managing workflows and invoices.
Represent locked Refs as invoices and handle workflow status flow using plugin responses.
Used to mark status in the plugin/invoice workflow.
Mark Refs as read for the current user across multiple sessions
Re-submit a URL which has already been submitted by another user. The first source of this Ref is the URL to be reposted.
Add common features Ext tag pages: Adding pinned Refs, sidebar markdown, a custom theme and a set of non-global custom themes to choose from in addition to global themes.
Internal Refs which should be hidden by default
Show locked icon on locked Refs and add filters for locked and unlocked Refs
Lock this post to prevent editing
Show private icon on non-public Refs and add filters for private and public Refs

Enable diff action for comparing reference versions using Monaco editor
Mark Refs as saved for the current user
Configure CSS classes for scraping websites.
Warning! This will load in the default scrape config to be used when a site-specific config cannot be found. If you have customized the default scrape config your changes will be overwritten.
Will delete any matches from image URLs
Update this Ref with the scraped resource
Are you sure you want to scrape?
Schedule scripts to be run on the server at specific intervals.
Remove the white border from the comment markdown.
Store secrets with opaque protected tags.
Activates built-in table support and allows users to create tables.
Quickly reply thanks to a ref.
Adds a terminal graphics style theme to the global theme list. Will combine themes if multiple specified with the same name.
Adds a night theme to the global theme list.
Attempt to merge similar Refs tagged plugin/thread into threads.
Activates built-in thumbnail support and allows users to add thumbnails to Refs.
Allows users to save useful public data in their Ext.
Activates built-in voting support and allows users to upvote Refs.
Allows users to downvote Refs. Required upvote plugin to be installed.
Activates built-in Wiki support and allows users to create Wikis.
